description: Update documentation to reflect the new CLI option.
instructions: Open the `README.md` file located at the root of the repository.
Locate the section describing the `run` command.
Add documentation for the new `--monitor` or `-m` option, explaining that it enables the terminal monitor during the task execution.
Locate the section detailing the `run` command usage.
Add documentation for the new `--monitor` or `-m` option, providing examples of how to use it.
Explain the purpose of the option and its effect on the execution flow.
Ensure the new documentation is consistent with the existing documentation style and formatting.
Save the changes to both `README.md` and `docs/usage.md`.
Run the AIWhisperer CLI with the `--help` flag for the `run` command (e.g., `aiwhisperer run --help`) to verify that the help message includes the new `--monitor` or `-m` option and its description.
constraints: Only modify the specified documentation files (`README.md`, `docs/usage.md`).
Ensure the documentation accurately reflects the functionality of the new CLI option implemented in `src/ai_whisperer/cli.py`.
validation_criteria: The `README.md` file is updated and includes information about the `--monitor` or `-m` option for the `run` command.
The `docs/usage.md` file is updated and provides clear instructions and examples for using the `--monitor` or `-m` option.
The CLI help message for the `run` command (`aiwhisperer run --help`) displays the `--monitor` or `-m` option with a correct description.
name: update_documentation
